metadata.title: CVE-2016-9584 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libical allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(use-after-free) and possibly read heap memory via a crafted ics file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libical3 - 3.0.1-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libical package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
libical3 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-5').
